name: Wormhole! (Josh McMillan)
description:
This is a take on the classic game Snakes and Ladders!

This game supports single-player and shared-machine multiplayer!

Here are the biggest differences:

  • Both snakes and ladders have been replaced with Wormholes!
  • Wormholes are bi-directional; you can go both ways!
  • Wormholes are hidden, you never know where one leads to next!
  • Wormholes are also randomly-generated, no two games are ever the same!

Gamepad Controls:

  • Select - [ Left Stick ]
  • Confirm / Exit Credits - [ A ]
  • Zoom - [ Right Stick ]

Keyboard Controls:

  • Select / Exit Credits - [ Arrow Keys ]
  • Confirm / Exit Credits - [ Spacebar / Enter ]
  • Zoom - [ Page Up & Page Down ]

Rules:

  • Each player takes a turn in order:
    • The player starts their turn by confirming.
    • The player rolls between 1-6.
      • If the player rolls a 6, wormholes are randomly regenerated!
    • The player then begins to move around the board the number rolled.
      • If the player passes a Wormhole Space (Purple), they may choose whether they would like to enter it or not.
        • If they enter it, they are placed to the connected space, and their turn is over.
        • If they leave it, they continue around the board normally.
      • If the player lands on a Normal Space (Teal), their turn is over, and the next player takes their turn.
      • If the player lands on a Wormhole Space (Purple), they are forced to take the wormhole, and their turn is over.
  • The Player that lands or passes the Finish Space (Gold) wins the game!
    • Note: You do not need an exact roll to finish the game!

Hope you enjoy!

- Josh
